column4: I am trying to open an encrypted message sent to me in evolution but it will not automaticly open, it comes up as an attachment (.dat fle) but recognises the mime type PGP/MIME-encrypted message-header attachment. How do i get it to automaticly decode the message, I have already added my key ID to the account prefrances.
what happens when you click on the email?
It tells me there is one attachment
download the attachment and then try to decrypt this .dat file
also, do you have gpg-agent installed?
rigved I have read encrypted mail before with evolution
It is installing now, what does it do?
have you read encrypted mail before sent from this user? is it possible that the sender took the wrong public key?
done
it is required to encrypt and decrypt
definatly have right key, i checked the id
restart evolution and try again
still wont work, might it be anything to do with the 'dat' extention
i just want to clear one thing - is the entire message encrypted or only the attachment?
everthing is encrypted, there is no message being displayed atm
so, when you click on the message, does evolution say "Formatting message" and is stuck there?
no it just has the attachment list
are you able to save the items in the download list? if yes, then you can decrypt these from the terminal...
I just decrypted it manualy on the command line but i would still like evolution to be able to do it, as i said it has done it before
it can only decrypt emails, not attached items, as far as i know
My irc client died, did you reply to me?
